title: President Soeharto in Australia, February 1972
creator_credit: Don Murray, Frank Bagnall and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: The Indonesian President and his wife are seen arriving at Canberra, and at official functions in Parliament House, the Australian War Memorial, the Melbourne Arts Centre, Mary Mead Children’s Home, Taronga Zoo, the new Indonesian Chancery and other points of interest.
creator_credit_for_label: Don Murray, Frank Bagnall and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
